thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Pierrel FY Net Results Turns To Loss Of EUR 2.5 Mln, Raises 2018 Gross Revenue Target

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Pierrel FY Net Results Turns To Loss Of EUR 2.5 Mln, Raises 2018 Gross Revenue Target
text:
March 1(Reuters) - PIERREL SPA:
* REPORTED ON WEDNESDAY FY REVENUE EUR 17.3 MLN VERSUS EUR 14.5 MLN YEAR AGO
* FY NET LOSS EUR 2.5 MLN VERSUS PROFIT EUR 2.4 MLN YEAR AGO
* RAISES 2018 GROSS REVENUE TARGET, SEES EUR 19.3 MLN VS PREVIOUS EUR 18.3 MLN
* CONFIRMS 2018 EBITDA TARGET OF EUR 1.8 MLN * CONFIRMS 2019-2020 TARGETS
Source text for Eikon:
 (Gdynia Newsroom)
